body: I've added some new tests for the RecipeContainer business - the bulk of the testing was needed where the RecipeContainer picked a revision/recipe from the store. This function has been broken out into `getSelectedRevision` in `RecipesSelector.js`, and necessary tests have been written there.
body_text: I've added some new tests for the RecipeContainer business - the bulk of the testing was needed where the RecipeContainer picked a revision/recipe from the store. This function has been broken out into getSelectedRevision in RecipesSelector.js, and necessary tests have been written there.
